tool_description: Tells the latest AI news and Tools.
title: AI hub

api_list.name: AiTools
api_list.description: Gives the latest AI Tools in marketplace.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-hub1.p.rapidapi.com/AiTools"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-hub1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
